scripts.start: npm run clear && parcel build ./static/images/* --out-dir dist/images  --no-cache && parcel build ./static/*  --no-cache && parcel ./static/index.pug --port 3000 --no-cache
scripts.build: npm run clear && parcel build ./static/images/* --out-dir dist/images  --no-cache && parcel build ./static/*  --no-cache
